abstract: A years-long copyright fight between Google and Oracle will continue. At issue are the bits of code that help pieces of software work together, called Application Programming Interfaces.
snippet: A years-long copyright fight between Google and Oracle will continue. At issue are the bits of code that help pieces of software work together, called Application Programming Interfaces.
lead_paragraph: Many in the tech community expressed dismay at a Supreme Court decision on Monday not to hear the appeal of a copyright decision against Google.

headline.main: Supreme Court Declines to Hear Appeal in Google-Oracle Copyright Fight
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Declines to Hear Google-Oracle Appeal
